Headline: NYT Articles for 100 Days of Trump
Text: A collection of NYT Articles written during President Trump's first 100 days.
Media Caption: The New York Times Developers

Headline: Donald Trump and the Theater of Access
Text: The press may not yet know how to cover the president, but the president knows exactly what to do with the press: Humiliate them. Found at: https://www.nytimes.com/2017/01/27/magazine/donald-trump-and-the-theater-of-access.html

Headline: Trump Vows to Dismantle Dodd-Frank ‘Disaster’
Text: The president is keeping a campaign pledge by saying again that he plans to roll back regulations put into place to prevent a financial crisis. Found at: https://www.nytimes.com/2017/01/30/us/politics/trump-dodd-frank-regulations.html

Headline: In a Week
Text: Trump Reshapes Decades of Perceptions About America
Media: A nation whose global image is built on openness to the world’s needy and ambitious is now viewed as closing its doors in a way it never did even after Sept. 11, 2001. Found at: https://www.nytimes.com/2017/01/29/us/donald-trump-perception-foreign-policy.html

Headline: Trump Supporters Applaud Immigration Order as a ‘Welcome Change’
Text: They say they feel safer and view the airport protests and objections as misguided. Found at: https://www.nytimes.com/2017/01/30/us/trump-travel-ban-republicans-conservatives.html

Headline: Trump to G.O.P. Gathering: Where’s My C.I.A. Director?
Text: President Trump asked a congressional Republican retreat in Philadelphia where his C.I.A. director was, raising questions about his understanding of the agency’s independence. Found at: https://www.nytimes.com/2017/01/26/us/politics/donald-trump-administration.html

Headline: Despite Sabbath
Text: Ivanka Trump and Husband Celebrate Inauguration
Media: The inaugural gatherings on Friday night posed an obstacle to their Orthodox Jewish observance of the Sabbath. Found at: https://www.nytimes.com/2017/01/20/us/ivanka-trump-jared-kushner-sabbath.html

Headline: Despite Sabbath
Text: Ivanka Trump and Husband Celebrate Inauguration
Media: The inaugural gatherings on Friday night posed an obstacle to their Orthodox Jewish observance of the Sabbath. Found at: https://www.nytimes.com/2017/01/20/us/ivanka-trump-jared-kushner-sabbath.html

Headline: On Guard: Reporters Gear Up to Cover President Trump
Text: The media columnist Jim Rutenberg and the White House correspondent Peter Baker on the Trump administration and the media challenges it poses. Found at: https://www.nytimes.com/2017/01/20/insider/on-guard-reporters-gear-up-to-cover-president-trump.html

Headline: Canada Today: Trump Is a Blessing and a Curse for Trudeau
Text: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau faces a balancing act over the resurrected Keystone XL pipeline, and plays down the effects of possible Nafta changes for Canada. Found at: https://www.nytimes.com/2017/01/27/world/canada/canada-today-trump-trudeau.html
